entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
